attributes.action: Protect our food security. Educate children in respect of food ie farm to fork.
attributes.additional_details: Importing food generates more pollution than it being British, nutritional values are better with homegrown food and it impacts the local economy and community. Encourage cooking real food with real nutritional value and growing of such food locally.
attributes.background: Protect farmland, encourage British grown and produced food. Education in respect of farm to fork and nutritional food.
